/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. On either side of the road, there are trees and bushes, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The road itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels along the path. A few cars can be seen on the road, going about their day. The image is taken from a low angle, looking down the length of the road, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting against the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a dynamic and lively snapshot of life in Beijing.
